name: CV3 Grim Reaper
author: Alucard648
info: Avatar of Death made on request by SkyFlare
description: CV 1/3 GrimReaper boss. Flies around, like wall bouncer, sometimes summons enemies.Skull-like second form.Large skull, the second form of CV3 Grim Reaper boss. Flies around in swirly pattern, wrapping around screen edges. Spawns one enemy from mouth oftentimes, or summons a bunch of enemies.
setup: CV1/3 Grim reaper (1st form)Attribute 1: Tile Width Attribute 2: Tile HeightAttribute 3: ID of enemies to summonAttribute 4: Number of enemies to summon per cast.Attribute 5: Gravitative movement. for sideview areas.Attribute 6: Maximum number of summoned enemies on screen.Cv3 SkullAttribute 1: Tile WidthAttribute 2: Tile HeightAttribute 3: ID of enemies to summonAttribute 4: Number of enemies to summon per cast.Attribute 5: Initial swirling angle.Attribute 6: Swirling speed. Negatinve for reverse direction.Attribute 7: Swirling radiusAttribute 8: Delay between summoning, in frames.
